name: GoodMorningWisdom
0:
”Alexa, open Good Morning Wisdom”
”Alexa, start Good Morning Wisdom”
”Alexa, launch Good Morning Wisdom”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good morning wisdom
des:
This skill is a simple one which helps you start your day on the right foot. 

After launching you can ask the skill to tell you a quote or tell you something smart. You can also ask for another quote. 
Once you're uplifted and received your quote(s), say, "Stop."

That's it. 

Enjoy the skills and check back often!
